oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Eprints: an open archive for papers related to research in organic agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Research communication and quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Organic Eprints archive - numbers, goals How to create an archive - open source, scalability How to fill the archive - motivations and barriers Future perspectives - research development and community building
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted (2004) Organic Eprints: an open archive for papers related to research in organic agriculture. Speech at: Open Archives Seminar: Facilitating free and efficient scientific communication, Technical University of Denmark, 18. February 2004.
